column4: i am going to build a new pc an a 1300 dollar budget. What is a good graphics card that would fit into a computer of that price range, and have good support on both linux and windows
you can't beat nvidia for that
that is what I thought,  but google searches keep telling me ati is the way to go
i disagree..   read this for info:   http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=news_item&px=Nzc3NQ
